name: Hotellier X
short_description:
Hotellier is an asp.net web application designed for speed, expansion, usability and simplicity, features are:

1. Intuitive, content friendly layout
2. 2 panel layout for easy access
3. Unlimited advertisement of rooms and offerings
4. One page asp.net model for ease in coding
5. Programmed in asp.net, html5 and css3
6. 6 default color themes + unlimited visitor mood change options as you can code
7. Facility for credit card payment, bank or other payments.
8. Unlimited code access
9. Unlimited addition of functionality
10. Header showcase slider (can be changed for something better)
11. Full asp.net 3.5 to 4.0 compatibility
